ingredients: +   1/4 cup minced onion, 2  limes, juiced, 2  serrano chile peppers, or to taste, 2  limes, juiced,   salt to taste, 4  ripe avocados, peeled and pitted,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro,   +   1/4 cup pomegranate seeds, divided, 1 sprig cilantro for garnish
